entries.waypoint_description_1: According to Boyrake, this is where the Canyon Corsairs are holed up.
entries.player_sorry: I am still looking for them.
entries.player_3_1: Did you say you were hit on the head?
entries.player_2_1: No thanks, I don't want to be a pirate.
entries.player_1_1: Yes! The pirate's life is for me!
entries.npc_reset: What could be better than sailing the spacelanes and boarding vessels! HA! It sounds like a great life! Well, you're missing out, I say!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Good for you! From what I've been told, all you need to do is go right up to these Canyon Corsairs and tell them you want to be a pirate and they'll welcome you with open arms. This is where they have their base! Maybe I'll see you and we can do pirate things together!
entries.npc_4_1: Hmm? Oh, of course I was hit on the head! What Imperial Naval Captain hasn't been? All it did was convince me to retire and join up with these rough brigands! I'll walk right up to them and say,
I'll be a pirate in no time, just like those other nice pirates! Do you want to be a pirate too?
entries.npc_3_1: What could be better than sailing the spacelanes and boarding vessels! HA! It sounds like a great life! Well, you're missing out, I say!
entries.npc_2_1: Good for you! From what I've been told, all you need to do is go right up to these Canyon Corsairs and tell them you want to be a pirate and they'll welcome you with open arms. This is where they have their base! Maybe I'll see you and we can do pirate things together!
entries.npc_1_1: Ahoy there! Ha ha. Have you ever wanted to be a pirate? I know I sure have. I spent over 20 years in the Imperial Navy combating pirates, blowing up ships, and being struck in the head, I found out something about myself! I want to be a pirate! And I know exactly where I can join up with some! How about you? do you want to be a pirate too?
